text:
October 10, 1968
Mr. Allen Miller
602 Gladstone Street
Pullman, Washington 99163
Dear Allens
We have reviewed the listings of educational stations
and find that WRUF-FM, Gainesville, Florida and
WHCU-AM-FM, Ithaca, New York are not educational
stations even though licensed to educational institÂ¬
utions.
WHAZ, Troy, New York, is, according to our records and
those of the FCC, a non-commercial station though it
does share time with two commercial stations.
Thanks for raising the question.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
RAM: lkl
